com.soa.alert.reporter.script
Interface AlertReporter

public interface AlertReporter

Provides alert reporting capabilities in a scripted environment.

To generate an alert you must first have a unique alert code that is registered in Policy Manager. You can then reference that alert code when you generate the alert as follows: 

    alerter.alert("90001", "Encountered this error while executing my script");

where "90001" is the unique alert code already defined.

Method Summary
 void alert(java.lang.String code)
          Generates an alert with the given alert code without a description.
 void alert(java.lang.String code, java.lang.String message)
          Generates an alert with the given alert code and description.
 

Method Detail

alert

void alert(java.lang.String code)
           throws com.digev.fw.exception.GException
Generates an alert with the given alert code without a description.

Parameters:
code - Alert code to use. Must be an alert code known by the Policy Manager system.
Throws:
com.digev.fw.exception.GException - Thrown if unable to generate the alert.

alert

void alert(java.lang.String code,
           java.lang.String message)
           throws com.digev.fw.exception.GException
Generates an alert with the given alert code and description.

Parameters:
code - Alert code to use. Must be an alert code known by the Policy Manager system.
message - Description of the cause for the alert.
Throws:
com.digev.fw.exception.GException - Thrown if unable to generate the alert.
